security_audit.summary: Documentation-only skill providing usage patterns for Flow Nexus cloud platform MCP tools. Contains no executable code and documents standard cloud service features like authentication, sandbox execution, and payments. Explicitly advises security best practices.

content.value_statement: Integrate Claude Code with Flow Nexus cloud platform for sandbox execution, app deployment, and credit management. Access pre-configured development environments and earn credits through coding challenges.
actual_capabilities: Create and configure cloud sandboxes with Node.js, Python, React, and Next.js templates
Execute code in isolated cloud environments with package installation and environment variables
Deploy applications from templates to production with configurable variables
Manage user authentication, profiles, and credit balances
Complete coding challenges to earn credits and track achievements
Upload and manage files in cloud storage buckets with real-time subscriptions
limitations: Requires Flow Nexus account and MCP server configuration
Sandbox execution time and resources depend on subscription tier
Credits required for sandbox usage, deployments, and neural training

use_cases.title: Rapid development
use_cases.description: Create pre-configured development sandboxes with packages and environment variables for fast prototyping

use_cases.title: Template deployments
use_cases.description: Deploy production applications from validated templates with automatic configuration management

use_cases.title: Skill improvement
use_cases.description: Practice algorithms and earn credits through coding challenges with leaderboards and achievements

prompt_templates.title: Create sandbox
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a new sandbox with the node template, install express and dotenv packages, set NODE_ENV to development, and name it my-api-project

prompt_templates.title: Deploy app
prompt_templates.prompt: Deploy the express-api-starter template with my database URL and Redis URL as variables, set LOG_LEVEL to info

prompt_templates.title: Check balance
prompt_templates.prompt: Check my credit balance and show my recent transaction history for the last 30 days

prompt_templates.title: Submit challenge
prompt_templates.prompt: Find the two-sum algorithm challenge, submit a solution in JavaScript, and show my achievement progress

output_examples.input: Create a Python sandbox for machine learning with numpy, pandas, and scikit-learn, then check my credit balance
output: Python sandbox created with ml-environment name

best_practices: Use environment variables for sensitive data instead of hardcoding credentials
Delete unused sandboxes to conserve credits and resources
Start with smaller sandbox templates when full resources are not needed
anti_patterns: Hardcoding API keys and passwords directly in sandbox configurations
Leaving sandboxes running when not actively using them
Ignoring audit logs and usage statistics for account security

faq.question: What tools support this skill?
faq.answer: This skill works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code through the Flow Nexus MCP server.

faq.question: What are the resource limits?
faq.answer: Free tier allows 2 concurrent sandboxes. Pro tier allows 10. Enterprise has unlimited concurrent sandboxes.

faq.question: How do I connect my existing tools?
faq.answer: Install the Flow Nexus MCP server, then use auth_init to initialize your connection with your Flow Nexus credentials.

faq.question: Is my data safe in sandboxes?
faq.answer: Sandboxes are isolated environments. Use private storage buckets for sensitive data and review audit logs regularly.

faq.question: Why is my sandbox not starting?
faq.answer: Check your credit balance, verify the template name is correct, and ensure your subscription tier supports the requested resources.

faq.question: How does this compare to other platforms?
faq.answer: Flow Nexus includes integrated credit system, coding challenges for earning credits, and Queen Seraphina AI assistant for guidance.
